title: fish conflict
desc: السلام عليكمصراع السمك هي عباره عن لعبة على نظام الاندرويدتفاصيل اللعبة1)هي عبارة عن سمكة تسير في محيط بحري2)تتمكن من التهام الاسماك الاصغر منها والاضعف منها القادمة اتجاهها وتجنب العثراتوكل اصطدام في العثرات او الاسماك الاكبر حجما او الاقوى تضعف السمكة3)امكانية تطوير السمكة من خلال استبدال النقاط المحصله اثناء اللعب او عن طريق شراء النقاط4)امكانية شراء مساعدات للسمكة (مثال :اسنان , زعانف) وكل ما تم تطوير السمكة يتم اخذ نقاط عند الاصطدام بالسمكة الاكبراو عدم تضعيف السمكة بالتعادل (تترك لتقدير اللاعب) او احتساب نقاط5)ان تكون على مراحل من الاسهل للاصعب6)في نهاية كل مرحلة يتم الصراع مع نوع من انواع السمك وتحطيم السمكة للانتقال الى المرحلة القادمة7)امكانية اختيار نوع السمكة ويكون سمك مغلق تفتح عند التقدم بالمراحل8)امكانية اللعب مع الاصدقاء تنقسم الى مسربين لكل لاعب مسرب وفي النهاية يتصارعان مع بعضهم وكسب التحديFish conflict is a game about the android systemGame Details1) is a fish traveling in a maritime environment2) You can devour the smaller fish and subtract them from their next direction and avoid bumpsAnd any collision in the jams or fish bigger or stronger weaken the fish3) The possibility of developing the fish through the replacement of points earned during the game or by buying points4) Possibility of buying fish aids (eg teeth, fins) and all that has been developed fish are taken points when colliding with the bigger fishOr do not put the fish in a draw (left to the discretion of the player) or count points5) Be in stages easier for harder6) At the end of each stage is the conflict with a kind of fish and destroy the fish to move to the next stage7) The possibility of choosing the type of fish and the thickness of the closed open when progress stages8) The possibility of playing with friends is divided into two tracks for each player is a leaper and in the end they wrestle with each other and win the challenge

title: iOS Game - single use / promotional game / pictures provided
desc: We are seeking to have a game developed on the iOS platform, it will be exactly as provided in the pictures below.1. The game will be a fishing game where users will have to enter their name, phone number and email address to play.2. Once the information is submitted, the user will see the 'pond' with fish swimming from overhead.3. In order to 'catch' a fish, they must touch the fish with their finger and follow it on screen while it swims around until the 'catch meter' is full.4. Once catch meter is full, the device will vibrate and a screen will appear showing type and size of fish caught (randomized).5. Once fish are caught, the information is sent to a MySQL database to be stored.This is a private game and will not be sold or allowed for public use.  This will be used to engage users at a tradeshow.  Please bid appropriately, your bid must represent your ACTUAL price.name,phone number, email enter screen: [url removed, login to view]pond screen: [url removed, login to view]fish caught screen: [url removed, login to view]://[url removed, login to view]

title: design an app for my business
desc: Toto Care ApplicationI need an app that people can use to find babysitters in their  area. The babysitters should be able to sign up and submit all relevant materials that they have, go through a back ground check up and be approved if they meet the [url removed, login to view] should be able to set up their accounts such that the money they make is transferred to their banks weekly after paying the totocare app fees. The babysitters should be able to post on the app their babysitting charges, based on 2 hrs, 4 hrs, 8 hrs or 12hrs shifts. The weekend charges should be slightly higher. The babysittersshould have an option to go online whenever they are ready to accept babysitting jobs.The parents who are looking for babysitters should be able to use the totocare app to find the nearest babysitters online and their charges, they would choose the babysitters they want and call/request their service. Once the babysitters accepts the service the parent should be able to get the directions on the applicationto the babysitters residence. Before the babysittersaccepts a request, they should be able to see the shift that the parent is requesting for instance 8hr-shift and from what time.The parents should be able to rate and write a review for the babysitter.

desc: Hello everyone.Global rights compliance is a company working in the field of International Humanitarian Law. One of our main objectives is to bring knowledge and expertise of international lawyers to those first responders on the ground, in IHL related matters.We are currently creating a manual for this purpose (extensive - with chapters and subsections).What we need:1. We would want this contact to reach one of our experts, who can then respond to the query.We are looking for a stylish design along with easy operability.Thanks everybody.

title: Build forms into my existing website
desc: 1--I have an existing website using weebly and I currently use Bookeo for my online booking. I am looking to add to it a form for hiring contractors.  The will need to have the ability to have the applicants upload documents and pictures, and also an online form with medical health questions,  and also a diagram where the client can indicate their problem areas, and room for explanations.  I would like to be able to access this from my phone so that I can easily provide this form to the contractors on site.  I would like all of the features to be easily accessible from both desktop and mobile sites.2--As part of this application process, I also need to link a business contract (no compete) for which I can provide the verbiage.  I would like to have it in electronic form to be signed electronically by new contractor applicants.  I would like to have it automatically sent to the applicant via email for their records, with the format being one that is easy to print and view on both desktop and mobile devices.3--I also will need to have an electronic form that can be completed by my clients during the online booking process, and that I can direct people to (so in the event that they call to book, I can schedule the appointment and refer them to the intake form or send a link).4--I would like to integrate a zip-code based gas-surcharge calculator into the existing check out process, so that when a zip code is entered, it adds a predetermined fuel surcharge to the price before payment (excluding those who buy prepay packages)5--I would like to have an app built for the contractors that I hire so they can access and accept potential jobs that I post there and view all the forms for employment.  I would also like a basic invoice generator so that contractors and invoice directly from the app, and get a copy sent to their email.  And I would like the financial information of AR/AP to populated for my accounting needs.I don't know if this is one big project, or several small ones, but I have listed everything in order of importance to me.  Please let me know what other information you need.
